title: Table

properties.name: description
properties.value:
A Table is a piece of scenery found throughout Gielinor. For most tables, players can put items on the table by using the item on the table.
When an item is placed on a table, it will take ten minutes to despawn, which is considerably longer than the standard two-and-a-half minutes.

content:
This article is about the scenery found throughout RuneScape. For other uses, see table (disambiguation).

A Table is a piece of scenery found throughout Gielinor. For most tables, players can put items on the table by using the item on the table. When an item is placed on a table, it will take ten minutes to despawn, which is considerably longer than the standard two-and-a-half minutes.

Therefore, for e.g. ultimate ironmen, putting things on tables can be helpful for inventory management.

Tables[edit | edit source]

Note: not all tables listed here can be used to put things on.

  • Barbarian table
  • Bathroom table
  • Book table
  • Broken table
  • Buffet table
  • Captain's Table
  • Ceremonial table
  • Chemistry Table
  • Chopping table
  • Cloth covered table
  • Corner Table
  • Cutting Table
  • Dwarven Consortium Table
  • Equipment table
  • Experiment table
  • Frozen table
  • Magic table
  • Map table
  • Meat table
  • Medical table
  • Navigator's table
  • Ned's Table
  • Office table
  • Operating table (Theatre of Blood)
  • Ore table
  • Preparation Table
  • Professor's table
  • Restraint Table
  • Shackle table
  • Stone table (Delrith)
  • Stone table (Wild Varrock)
  • Table (Granite)
  • Table (The Forsaken Tower)
  • Table (Wyvern Cave)
  • Table and till
  • Table saw
  • Toy table
rawContent:
{{Otheruses|the scenery found throughout RuneScape|other uses|table (disambiguation)}}
A '''Table''' is a piece of scenery found throughout Gielinor. For most tables, players can put items on the table by using the item on the table.
When an item is placed on a table, it will take ten minutes to despawn, which is considerably longer than the standard two-and-a-half minutes.

Therefore, for e.g. [[ultimate ironmen]], putting things on tables can be helpful for [[Ultimate_Ironman_Guide/Item_Management#Putting_items_on_a_table|inventory management]].

==Tables==
'''Note:''' not all tables listed here can be used to put things on.
{{/Tables}} <!-- To add a table to the list, edit the "Table/Tables" page -->
